circumstances: While on a LOC/DME approach to Patterson-Harry P. Williams Airport in marginal weather conditions, the pilot was completing a left turn when the airplane collided with trees and crashed. Both occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Collision with trees on final approach due to improper IFR operation. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Low ceiling, 
- Fog,
- Visibility one mile or less, 
- Left engine ingested wood, 
- Found no pre-impact damage to right engine.
